text: Misha Mengelberg (5 June 1935 â€“ 3 March 2017) was a Dutch jazz pianist and composer.Feather, Leonard & Gitler, Ira (2007) The Biographical Encyclopedia of Jazz, p. 459. Oxford University Press. He won the Gaudeamus International Composers Award in 1961. Mengelberg died in Amsterdam on 3 March 2017, aged 81."Jazzmuzikant Misha Mengelberg overleden" (3 March 2017). Het Parool. ==Solo albums== * 1979: Pech Onderweg (BV Haast) * 1982: Musica Per 17 Instrumenti / 3 Intermezzi /Omtrent Een Componistenactie Composer's Voice * 1994: Impromptus (FMP) * 1997: Misha Mengelberg (I Dischi Di Angelica) * 1997: The Root Of The Problem (hatOLOGY) * 1999: Two Days In Chicago (hatOLOGY) * 2000: Solo (Buzz) * 2005: Senne Sing Song (Tzadik) ==References== ==Other websites== *1996 Mengelberg interview conducted by Dan Warburton *Discography from the European Free Improvisation Pages *ICP Orchestra Homepage *FMP releases Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:20th-century Dutch composers Category:21st-century Dutch composers Category:Jazz pianists Category:Musicians from Kyiv
title: Misha Mengelberg
